short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your spending at the click of a button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily track how much you spend at the click of a button. Users can set a limit and check how far they are from hitting that number. And if you go over that desired limit, no worries. You can also track how much money you spent beyond the intended restriction. You can reset your balance or limit at any given time. 

Color coded numbers for not only for style, but they're there for your benefit too. Green means you're in the clear but red on the other hand, well you can guess what that means.
